Actions.Name: Chant of Investiture
Actions.Description: An ally in range is marked by the [name] and gains resistance, sturdy, and +1 boon on all attacks and saves. While in this stance, the [name] is immobile and must spend 1 action during their turn to maintain this stance. It ends if the [name] takes damage.

Actions.Name: Hypnogogia
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 of the [name] becomes pacified. If already pacified, the character becomes unable to dash, rush, or fly until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Escape
Actions.Description: The [name] swaps place with a marked ally, removing and placing both of them.
